name: Professor Dr. AKM Fazlul Hoque
description: Dr. AKM Fazlul Haque is the best doctor as a former student of Dhaka Medical College. At present, he practices his expertise at Eden Muli-Care Hospital. Located in 753 Satmasjid Road, Dhaka-1205, Bangladesh.

name: Professor Dr. Mahbub H Khan
description: Professor Dr. Mahbub H Khan is one of the most reputed Liver and Gastroenterology specialists in Bangladesh. He completed his MBBS with the highest-ranking result. He was awarded Leo Gold Medal for first place in the third professional examination.

name: Dr. Mohammad Jahangir Talukder
description: Dr. Mohammad Jahangir Talukder is a reputed Internal Medicine specialist in Bangladesh. He is experienced in the treatment of Acute medical emergency, Respiratory, Endocrine, and Infectious diseases.

name: Professor Dr. Sheikh Nesaruddin Ahmed
description: Professor Dr. Sheikh Nesaruddin Ahmed is one of the best Internal Medicine & Reumatology in Bangladesh. He was the former professor and Head Department of Medicine, Dhaka Medical College Hospital.

name: Professor Dr. H A M Nazmul Ahsan
description: Professor Dr. H A M Nazmul Ahsan is the reputed Medicine Specialist in Bangladesh. He is a professor in the Department of Medicine, Popular Medical College & Hospital, Dhaka.

name: Professor Dr. Ferdous Ara J. Janan
description: Dr. AKM Fazlul Haque is the best doctor as a former student of Dhaka Medical College. At present, he practices his expertise at Eden Muli-Care Hospital. Located in 753 Satmasjid Road, Dhaka-1205, Bangladesh.

name: Professor Dr. A K M Musa
description: Professor Dr. A K M Musa is one of the well-known Diabetologist & Medicine Specialist in Bangladesh. He is the professor of the Department of Medicine, Ibrahim Medical College.

name: Professor Dr. R. K. Saha
description: Professor Dr. R. K. Saha is another best Medicine Specialist in Bangladesh. He was the former Principal and Professor and Head Department of Medicine, Sher-E-Bangla Medical College, Barisal, and Uttara Women's Medical College Hospital, Dhaka.

name: Professor Dr. Mohiuddin Ahmed
description: Assistant Professor Dr. Mohiuddin Ahmed is one of the best-reputed Medicine and Neuromedicine Specialist in Bangladesh. Now, he is the Assistant Professor of Neurology, Dhaka Medical College Hospital, Dhaka.
